item.title: Blockchain Nights
item.description: 18.01 Blockchain Nights #4 Nikola Stojanow, Business Development at Aeternity - "Scalable blockchain technology for smart contracts" Sherry Li, COO at scry.info (Singapore) - "Applications of blockchain to data science" Joshua Scigala, CEO at Vaultoro.com (tab) - "Money... WTF is it anyway?" ​ ​ ​
